charaepi_ch0004_10_toko/2301_1101_0200_2: They watched as Hilda had some intense battles.
charaepi_ch0004_10_toko/2301_1201_0300_1: All right! That’s our tenth win in a row!
charaepi_ch0004_10_toko/2301_1201_0400_1: Oof... I don’t see any way I could’ve won that...
charaepi_ch0004_10_toko/2301_1201_0500_1: Thanks for the battle! Let’s do this again sometime!
charaepi_ch0004_10_toko/2301_0401_0700_1:
Not too shabby, if I do say so myself!
With Victini as my partner, I feel like I’m
overflowing with power!
charaepi_ch0004_10_toko/2301_0402_0900_1:
We sure are, but we’re not done yet! Our goal is
to hit a one-hundred win streak!
charaepi_ch0004_10_toko/2301_1201_1000_1:
You’re amazing, Hilda! I think you really will get
to a hundred at this rate!
charaepi_ch0004_10_toko/2301_1201_1100_1: Good job to you, too, Victini!
charaepi_ch0004_10_toko/2301_1201_1200_1:
I guess what people say about Victini is true—that
it has the power to bring victory!
charaepi_ch0004_10_toko/2301_0401_1400_1: People believe it has that power, yeah.
charaepi_ch0004_10_toko/2301_0302_1500_1: So you can win if you’re with Victini?
charaepi_ch0004_10_toko/2301_1201_1700_1:
Team Plasma once caused a commotion at
Unova’s Liberty Garden because they were
after that power.
charaepi_ch0004_10_toko/2301_1201_1800_1: I met this Victini in Castelia City...
charaepi_ch0004_10_toko/2301_1201_1900_1:
But I wonder if it has some kind of connection to
that Victini from Liberty Garden.
charaepi_ch0004_10_toko/2301_1201_2000_1:
Hm... I’m curious, too. Maybe N would be able to
figure out more from Victini.
charaepi_ch0004_10_toko/2301_1201_2100_1:
But you know what? Even if Victini does have the
power to bring victory, Hilda’s strength is the
real deal.
charaepi_ch0004_10_toko/2301_1201_2200_1:
Of course I’m strong! Know what my secret is?
When I’m battling, I do my best to enjoy it!
charaepi_ch0004_10_toko/2301_1201_2300_1: I give it my all and so does Victini!
charaepi_ch0004_10_toko/2301_1201_2400_1:
When we smash all of that together, we combine
our strength into a single, massive power!
charaepi_ch0004_10_toko/2301_1201_2500_1:
I think once I got the hang of that feeling,
our win rate really started to rise!
charaepi_ch0004_10_toko/2301_1201_2600_1:
Coming together to create something bigger...
I guess that’s something you can experience with
other partner Pokémon, too.
charaepi_ch0004_10_toko/2301_1201_2800_1: Together, we train, battle, play, sleep, fight...
charaepi_ch0004_10_toko/2301_1201_2900_1:
I bet when it comes down to it, the key to winning
is spending a lot of time with your
partner Pokémon.
charaepi_ch0004_10_toko/2301_1201_3100_1:
Let’s go, Victini! If we win this next battle, we can
bump our win streak up to 11!
charaepi_ch0004_10_toko/2301_1201_3300_1: Victini must think Hilda’s an ideal Trainer.
charaepi_ch0004_10_toko/2301_1201_3400_1:
Victini has the power to bring victory, and
Hilda herself is like a magnet for winning.
charaepi_ch0004_10_toko/2301_1201_3500_1:
They’re perfect for each other as a sync pair,
aren’t they.
charaepi_ch0004_10_toko/2301_1201_3600_1: Let’s go, Victini! This victory is ours for the taking!
